mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYSTEMUSER_HIS (PK_SYSTEMUSER, SYSTEMUSER_ORG, SYSTEMUSER_CODE, SYSTEMUSER_DESC, INSERT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, CREATOR, MODIFIER,BKUP_TIMESTAMP) SELECT PK_SYSTEMUSER, SYSTEMUSER_ORG, SYSTEMUSER_CODE, SYSTEMUSER_DESC, INSERT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, CREATOR, MODIFIER,CURRENT_DATE FROM SYSTEMUSER

INSERT INTO SYSTEMUSER (PK_SYSTEMUSER, SYSTEMUSER_ORG, SYSTEMUSER_CODE, SYSTEMUSER_DESC, INSERT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP, CREATOR, MODIFIER) VALUES(#{PK_SYSTEMUSER}, #{SYSTEMUSER_ORG}, #{SYSTEMUSER_CODE}, #{SYSTEMUSER_DESC}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp, 'Admin', 'Admin')
